short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be alerted when you open up a some of esec's pages. Also included a fast navigation. CURRENTLY IN ALPHA TESTING!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's just a really simple extension, that you can use for fast navigation between esec's pages and also esec's projects.
